column5: Can anybody recommend a reliable mercury repair shop in the GTA? Just looking to get some basic work done like changing my water pump, and yearly maintenance type stuff.  Thanks
I thought you were in the Great State of Ky. Matty???
I am in the great state of Kentucky but i keep my boat in ontario.
Dammit Man!!!  Takes longer to go get the boat than it does to get to the lake eh?
